Alice's Sister's Total Cousins: - Cousins from Mother's Side = C - Cousins from Father's Side (2 sisters and 5 teenagers counted) = D  The number of cousins of Alice’s sister will equal to the total cousins Alice has derived from both parents, (2 sisters + 0 children from sister) + (5 from brother + children of the father’s sister).
